Detailed Description

This module consists of functions used throughout the source base.

bool FS::GetRealPath ( const wxString &  fileName,
wxString &  realPath 
)

Get the full path of a relative fileThis is a platform-agnostic version of realpath(), without any silly buffer size restrictions.

Parameters:
fileNameRelative path to file (in)
realPathFully expanded file path (out)
Returns:
True if successful, false otherwise
